title: Strengthening Customer Experience Practice Competencies: Microlearning Course for Enhancing Technology Integration Skills in Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational educational theories and general computer literacy
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can explain and apply at least three TPACK framework-based strategies for integrating technology, content, and pedagogy.
When designing social studies lessons using mobile tools, a rubric can be created to assess students' ability to utilize technology
Perform technology-integrated lesson simulations at least three times within a week and incorporate peer feedback
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
